name: Engines
description:
Engines Demo (Work in Progress)

Objective is to destroy all enemies in a level and reach the exit located straight up. Level 5 is a special case, where you have to only reach the exit. It is open from the start.

Use the arrow keys or WASD to move. Fire your main cannon with the left mouse and machine gun with the right mouse.

Game has no sound yet. I'll add some when I get to it.
